name: God Thread
type: The Seven Warlords of the Sea/Donquixote Pirates
effect: [Main] K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost 5 or less. Then, add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as active.
trigger: [Trigger] Add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as active.
